Perceptor:

"Slag" thought Perceptor, and he came back to Preds Base while 
he sent  acomm link to Blackstorm


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/13/03 12:23:59 AM Central Daylight 
Time, 
> EmprzAnastazia@a... writes:
> 
> 
> > 
> > >> Still in a state similar to unconsciousness, her form 
twitched a couple 
> >> times as it continued the repairs. Nothing simple 
considering part of her 
> >> form was organic. 
> >> 
> >> In her meta-processor... it raced.. as though like a dream. 
Again.. she 
> >> twitched. 
> >> 
> >> After a time of silence, her optics shot open. Then she shot 
upright then 
> >> gasped as though coming up for air like a human 
underwater too long. For a 
> >> moment she was in a daze. 
> >> 
> > 
> > Still in the daze, her optics glanced about. Then glanced at 
her damaged 
> > body; it looked horrific. She still felt low on power/weak. She 
hated the 
> > feeling. 
> > 
> > Opening her internal com, though somewhat damaged, 
"Perceptor.... I need 
> > your... assistance.... immediately," she stated softly. 
> > 
> > As she waited for Perceptor, her optics then noticed Hydras 
nearby. It 
> > calmed her lasercore to know he was still functioning. 
> > 
> 
> Her power low, feeling rather odd. Must have been the organic 
side of her. 
> 
> She then sank back into the tank & went offline/unconscious 
again. Resting, 
> allowing the healing to continue. Hopefully. Some parts of her 
were not 
> wanting to repair/heal.
